channel.title: Tech on Bucket's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Tech on Bucket's Notes

item.title: baby's first commands
item.description: pwd check current directory cd change directory ls see whats in this directory cat [file] to quickly view small files less [file] to quickly view large files nano [file] to quickly edit files Ctrl-C quit a program running in terminal mkdir [name] make a directory rm [name] delete a file rm -r [name] delete a directory and all contents cp [source] [destination] copy files around apt update then apt upgrade to update software apt install [package]

item.title: checking system state
item.description: htop check processes running lsb_release -a check linux version uname -a some more system specs inc OS and architecture deets cat /proc/version cat /proc/cpuinfo, lscpu look at cpu specs lspci / lshw | grep video find out about the graphics card cat /proc/meminfo free -m check ram df -h free space on disk who roles -v finger

item.title: managing packages
item.description: apt update then apt upgrade to update software apt install [package] dpkg -i [/path/to/package.deb] to install a .deb tar -xzvf [file.tar.gz] to unpack a tar add script in usr/bin to add program to dmenu #!/bin/sh /path/to/run/script apt show [package] check if a package is installed

item.title: working with ssh
item.description: scp (-i [key]) [source] [destination] remote location will need user@ip:/PATH ssh (-i [key]) [user@ip] key generation ssh-keygen -t ed25519 -f ~/.ssh/[name of key] cat [name of key].pub | nc [host] [port]
